casebody.data:
THREE-C BODY SHOPS, INC.
v.
NATIONWIDE MUT. FIRE INS. CO. 2017-0741 Supreme Court of Ohio. January 31, 2018

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

APPEALS NOT ACCEPTED FOR REVIEW O'Connor, C.J., and O'Donnell, J., dissent and would accept the cause and consolidate the cause for briefing and decision with 2017-0740, Three-C Body Shops, Inc. v. Nationwide Mut. Fire Ins. Co. O'Neill, J., not participating.
